text: وَلَقَدۡ عَهِدۡنَآ إِلَىٰٓ ءَادَمَ مِن قَبۡلُ فَنَسِيَ وَلَمۡ نَجِدۡ لَهُۥ عَزۡمٗا

translation.en: And We had already taken a promise from Adam before, but he forgot; and We found not in him determination
translation.id: (Dan sungguh telah Kami pesankan526) kepada Adam dahulu, tetapi dia lupa, dan Kami tidak dapati kemauan yang kuat padanya
